title: rustc nightly build crashes when generating doc for crossbeam v0.8.1

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
The crash happened during Glommio's Github "doc-nightly" check. It happened consistently for three times: 1. https://github.com/DataDog/glommio/runs/5870536608?check_suite_focus=true 2. https://github.com/DataDog/glommio/runs/5860399018?check_suite_focus=true 3. https://github.com/DataDog/glommio/runs/5860206267?check_suite_focus=true ### Code ```Rust ``` ### Meta This is a bug about nightly build. ``` note: rustc 1.62.0-nightly (8f36334ca 2022-04-06) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', src/librustdoc/passes/collect_intra_doc_links.rs:977:16 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', src/librustdoc/passes/collect_intra_doc_links.rs:977:16 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f3f418a9cbd - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h39a05c79[153](https://github.com/DataDog/glommio/runs/5870536608?check_suite_focus=true#step:5:153)cf59e at /rustc/8f36334ca939a67cce3f37f24953ff6f2d3f3d33/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f3f418a9cbd -
